casebody.data:
Christopher W. ABELLS
v.
Tiffany J. MARTIN (formerly Abells). No. 413P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Alicia J. Jurney, Raleigh, for Abells, Tiffany J. (Martin). Christopher W. Abells, for Abells, Christopher W.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th of December 2015 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 10th of December 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
